metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4536 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The client in OpenAFS before 1.6.17 does not properly initialize the (1) AFSStoreStatus, (2) AFSStoreVolumeStatus, (3) VldbListByAttributes, and (4) ListAddrByAttributes structures, which might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive memory information by leveraging access to RPC call traffic.

criterions.comment: openafs package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.17-1').
